Size Class Reference

#include <Apoxi/Gui/Size.hpp>

 Size (const Size &size)
 Size (XYDIM width=0, XYDIM height=0)

Detailed Description

Combines the width and height of a drawable object. The width and height are represented by the type XYDIM.
